ItemDesc: Upon use, increases all allies' CRIT DMG by <unbreak>36%</unbreak> for the next battle.
ItemBGDesc: A souvenir that {NICKNAME} sells on {TEXTJOIN#87}... Wait, no, you remember you bought a raccoon plushie! It was supposed to be the cute and mischievous figure of a little raccoon, so how'd it become a figure for this girl? How self-absorbed can one person be? "Come on, Gray Hair. Why so serious? You gotta have fun! This toy can go a long way if you just kick it. Come have a try!" "AGGHHGHGHHGHH! My toes!"
